original_text: At the command of the Lord they camped, and at the command of the Lord they set out. They kept the charge of the Lord, at the command of the Lord by Moses.
korean_text: 곧 그들이 여호와의 명령을 따라 진을 치며 여호와의 명령을 따라 행진하고 또 모세를 통하여 이르신 여호와의 명령을 따라 여호와의 직임을 지켰더라

sentences.original_text: At the command of the Lord they camped
and at the command of the Lord they set out
They kept the charge of the Lord
at the command of the Lord by Moses
